summary: The Rule of Accident is about a group of theatre students who are trying to prepare and present a piece of theatre.
cast: Amir Jafari|Ashkan Khatibi|Mehrdad Sedighian|Baharan BaniAhmadi|Mohammad Reza Ghaffari|Elahe Hesari|Martin Shamoonpour|Neda Jebraeili|Roshanak Gerami|Sorush Sehhat|Omid Roohani|Soroosh Malamir|Ehsan Mahsoori
title: Ghaedeye tasadof
